revised_title: Examination of Electricity Phenomena in Italy
tldr: The author, Abbe Nollet, shares his observations and experiments on the medical applications of electricity in Italy. He discusses the use of electricity to cure various ailments and the transmission of odoriferous substances through electrified glass. Despite the claims made by others, Nollet admits to his own lack of success in replicating these experiments and expresses his desire to learn the correct methods from others.
